class_notes: This section is for DABSN semester 3 students only. Clinical TBA, clinical meetings TBA
course_description: This course provides clinical experience with adults or children who have acute health problems and chronic condition exacerbations. Students provide patient and family centered care through evidence-based interventions, outcome documentation, collaboration, and communication.
